item.title: Database management system and its Scope
item.author: Author
item.description: DBMS (Database Management System) is a system or software specifically designed to manage a database and perform operations on data requested by many users. DBMS is an intermediary for users with the database, to be able to interact with the DBMS can use the database language that has been determined by the DBMS company. Database languages generally consist of various kinds of instructions that are formulated so that these instructions can be processed by the DBMS.
